description: This requirement is open only to those CAITTS Supply Arrangement Holders for services in the National Capital Region for the following category:
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Cyber Threat Intelligence and Exams

## Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: W3330-25-036
* Publication Date: June 24, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 16, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Number: 2

## Contract Information
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 24, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: April 30, 2025

## Tender Status
* Status: Expired

## Procurement Information
* Category: Educational Technology (UNSPSC Code 86141700)
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal

## Contracting Entity
* Name: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 60 Moodie Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0K2, Canada

## Contact Information
* Email: DSGBids-OffresGSN@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 410-2573

## Description of Work
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires Cyber Threat Intelligence training and exams. The description of work includes:

* Educational and Training Services
* Alignment with National Capital Region requirements

## Security Requirements
* No security requirements
* Minimum corporate security required: N/A
* Minimum resource security required: N/A

## Pre-Qualification Requirements
* Suppliers must be pre-qualified on the CAITTS Supply Arrangement
* Suppliers must meet the Educational and Training Services category requirements

## Language of Evaluation
* Evaluation of submissions will be conducted in both English and French
* Suppliers must be able to provide documentation and reports in both official languages

Please note: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. The PDF documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the pre-qualified suppliers.
